title: The Song of the Phoenix
description: When Finn inherits the kingdom of Dyre, he is startled to learn the castle is a haven for runaway and self-rescued princesses. At the coronation, it is evident that the tunic-and-trouser clad Princess Lucia resents anyone who would attempt to take up the scepter of the previous king--despite the prediction of the kingdom's clairvoyant cat, Jasper, who insists the fates of the two are joined. Adventure, comedy, mystery, romance--The Song of the Phoenix is enchanting entertainment for all!
author: Amy Lemco
